person.persName: Sebastian S. Stone (Woodford County, KY, laborer & 1st lieut 21st Inf (USA))

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Stone. Father of John A. Stone, Margaret Stone, William H. Stone, Hallie Stone, and Susan Stone. Laborer in Woodford County in 1850. Served in the 21st Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from January 2, 1862, to January 2, 1863. Died of a wound received in battle at Stone River, Tennessee, on January 2, 1863.
